Name: Jibril Wahab
BioText:
Jibril Wahab 18 years old, a French reciter who learned the recitation of the Holy Quran under the supervision of English reciter Qari Ilyass Al Badr.
He started to share his recitations on social networks and by the grace of God, Jibril Wahab now travels the world to recite the words of Allah.
